 Looking Forward:  
Energy and Carbon Emissions  
 
We will continue to focus on energy conservation and target 20,000 MWh of electricity savings from energy 
conservation projects in FY2016. We continue to make progress toward our five- year goal of reducing total 
scope 1 and 2 emissions by  10 percent by CY2017 (using results from CY2011 as the baseline). In the area of 
scope 3 emissions, we will assess data that we added in previous years to determine other improvement opportunities.
